title: Breed of Envy
description: Six months ago, Director Greene recruited me to the CGE to train to hunt demons.Four months ago, I agreed to finish my first Phase in less than half the time.Two months ago, I got bit by a vampire, almost died, and found out I have demon DNA.Now... Demons aren't the only thing I have to fight.Because I'm changing, and that changes everything.
author: Lanie Jordan
